    • isSameList

      public static <T> boolean isSameList(List<T> list, List<T> anotherList)
      Check if two lists are equal
      Parameters:
      list - The first list to compare.
      anotherList - The second list to compare to.
      Returns:
      true if lists are equal (doesn't consider order and frequencies).

    • partition

      public static <T> List<List<T>> partition(List<T> list, int elementsPerPartition)
      Partition a list into n partitions (sublists) of equal size (elementsPerPartition). The last list may be smaller than elementsPerPartition.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the list
      Parameters:
      list - the list to partition
      elementsPerPartition - number of elements per partition
      Returns:
      a list of partitions

    • isInteger

      Check if the given string is an integer
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the string is an integer, false otherwise

    • parseInteger

      public static int parseInteger(String string)
      Parse integer without exceptions
      Parameters:
      string - the string to parse
      Returns:
      parsed integer or 0 if the string is not an integer

    • wrapWithSpaces

      public static String wrapWithSpaces(String string, int maxLength, int spacing)
      Wrap a long string into a new string with line breaks every maxLength characters and spacing at the beginning and a the end of each line.
      Parameters:
      string - the string to wrap
      maxLength - the maximum length of each line
      spacing - the spacing to add at the beginning and end of each line
      Returns:
      the wrapped string
